short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record and create demo videos seamlessly with PuppyDog Screen Recorder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the PuppyDog Screen Recorder to easily capture high-quality video demos right from your Chrome browser. 

This extension allows you to record your screen and audio with just one click, making it simple to showcase product features or tutorials.
